Excluded.Name: test-buffer-ascii.js
Excluded.Description: Relies on Node's way of converting non-8-bit ASCII by stripping the high bits. Java does it differently unless we custom code it.

Excluded.Reason: UNIX sockets are not supported in Noderunner or in Java.
